metadata.title: CVE-2024-49945 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/ncsi: Disable the ncsi work before freeing the associated structureThe work function can run after the ncsi device is freed, resultingin use-after-free bugs or kernel panic.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
